Amount of successfull Download Changes on the current project.

Disable the update of the clock pulse variables. This may save CPU load on controllers with a poor processor if these variables are not needed.
FALSE: Clock Pulse variables are updated.
TRUE: Clock Pulse variables are not updated.
Default value is FALSE.
The executed project and the boot project are binary equal.
Project contains additional data for the PC WORX online project compare functionality.
